entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 p.m. ADT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
